hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Al-Ahwas that his father said:"I entered upon the Messenger of Allah [SAW] and he saw me looking scruffy. The Prophet [SAW] said: 'Do you have anything?' He said: 'Yes, Allah has given me all kinds of wealth.' He said: 'If you have wealth, let it be seen on you

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنْ لُبْسِ الثِّيَابِ وَمَا يُكْرَهُ مِنْهَا
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning Clothes Which it is Recommended to Wear, and Those Which is Disliked to Wear
